alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 06 at 7:57PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, Chesterfield, City of Richmond, Goochland, Hanover, Henrico and Powhatan. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 757 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Richmond, Bon Air, Tuckahoe, University Of Richmond, Downtown Richmond, Virginia Commonwealth University, Virginia Union University, Moseley, Mechanicsville, Manakin, Laurel, Lakeside, Wyndham, Chesterfield Court House, Glen Allen, East Highland Park, Midlothian, Roslyn Hills, Dumbarton and Short Pump. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Powhatan
